talks.title: Introduction to PHP
talks.description: An interactive live-stream where individuals will be able to ask questions and follow along as I introduce learners to the PHP language. Together we'll be building an interactive photo gallery from scratch!

talks.title: Developing for the Microsoft HoloLens
talks.description: Cursory overview of the Microsoft Hololens platform, as well as a live demonstration of developing an application for it using Unity.

talks.title: Introduction to Laravel 5
talks.description: Demonstrated how to get started using the Laravel framework to flexibly develop web applications from scratch.

talks.title: Introduction to Unity - Advanced
talks.description: Piggybacked off of a previous talk, continued to crowd-develop a rudimentary VR baseball game while showcasing development stategies when tackling augmented and virtual reality.

talks.title: Introduction to Unity
talks.description: Showcased the ease of development when creating applications or games using the Unity game engine. The audience determined a topic, baseball, and followed along as we developed a complimentary VR game in under an hour.

talks.title: VR @ OU
talks.description: Every week I introduced community members to virtual reality, its applications, games, uses, and development.

talks.title: Introduction to 3D Printing
talks.description: Hosted a weekly workshop on developing 3D models and turning those creations into reality using next-generation 3D printers available to the facility.

talks.title: Hacking Home Automation - A DIY Approach to Your Smart Home
talks.description: Hosted a workshop that taught individuals how to combine off-the-shelf components, open source platforms, and a little hardware hackery to furnish a secure home automation platform on the cheap.
